title: Collaborative Web Platform-Based Serious Game Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of game-based learning and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening serious game design capabilities using collaborative web platforms in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core elements of serious games that effectively convey scientific concepts.
Learners can complete a game design prototype collaboratively with a team of three or more using a collaborative web platform.
Learners can create a game design document that meets formative assessment criteria by applying the 23 design blocks of the co.LAB framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
